title: Diamond as Big as the Ritz - point of view

content.question: In the passage as a whole, the narrator’s point of view is that of

choices.label: a detached figure who describes Hades and its inhabitants objectively
an all-knowing persona who possesses insight into John’s thoughts and emotions
a friend of the Ungers’ who is describing the family’s history to an acquaintance
an unreliable commentator who is likely misreporting the details of the story

content.answer: an all-knowing persona who possesses insight into John’s thoughts and emotions

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
